column5: I hope everyone in N.W. Ontario is fairing ok right now. I'm just west of Thunder bay and we got some good sized hail and some wicked winds. I was just wondering is anyone saw any tornados touch down? Thundering and lightening and pouring out right now. Roger Mayer.
We had that system hit us too. Had baseball sized hail about 20 miles away and lots of rain and wind. Couple of tornados touched down as well here in southern Manitoba. Fish ON!!
